Detailed Description

Listener for Favourite events. The abstract functions are the callback functions that is called for the respective asynchronous function call in FavouriteInterface.

Create a subclass and implement the callbacks and add a subclass object to the FavouriteInterface to start getting favourite callbacks.

The error function, declared in the super class Listener, will be called for all requests that returns with an error.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void WFAPI::FavouriteListener::favouritesChanged (  )  [pure virtual]

Called by the API when the favrourites has been changed.

virtual void WFAPI::FavouriteListener::favouritesSynced ( RequestID  requestID  )  [pure virtual]

Called when the synchronisation of favrourites with the server has completed. The synchronisation is started by the syncFavourites function in FavouriteInterface.

Parameters:
requestID The identification of the syncFavourites request sent from the FavouriteInterface.
